on_boarding_title_1: The Latest Way to Invest in Real Estate
on_boarding_description_1: We provide you with modern ways to invest in real estate securely and authentically.
on_boarding_description_2: We offer you a comprehensive and seamless dashboard to track your investments and funds through the portfolio.
on_boarding_description_3: We issue seamless ownership certificates for all investors to invest in their properties.
auth_method_description: choose between secure login or quick registration to tailor your access.
all_done_description: We have sent you an email, check your inbox
have_no_products_description: Try adding some products and it will appear in this page from the plus icon below
our_terms: Welcome to the SSH Company Development application, where we provide you with a powerful tool aimed at facilitating development processes and improving performance within your company
reset_password_sub_text: Enter your phone number, and we will send a text message containing four digits of advice. Do not share this number with anyone.
confirm_code_sub_text: A four-digit code has been sent to your phone number via text message. Enter the code below.
begin_investing_sub_text: Your investing journey starts from here
begin_investing_step1: You will receive legal ownership documents from the platform
begin_investing_step2: You will get monthly rent returns
begin_investing_step3: All your assets will be preserved by time
view_investments_chances_sub_text: Browse now exclusive investment opportunities in real estate
investment_limit_sub_text: Start investing now to get higher
Invite_friends: Invite your friends and win now!!
Invite_friends_sub_text: Invite your friends and you will be rewarded to your balance to invest freely and safely
account_verification: Please verify your account to gain access to property details and make investments
your_job_sub_text: Tell us about your job to have a personalized experience in the application
your_address_sub_text: This adds to the security of the application and keeps you safe from any fraud individuals
name_of_work_place: The name of your work place
name_of_work_owner: What's the name of your work owner?
address_of_work: What's the address of your work place?
